title: Night Fury: First Act
description: My name is Catarina.Or, thatâ€™s who I was christened to be, anyways.I live in a convent. I am a nun in training. A postulant.I am eighteen years old.I am a predator.No one is safe from me.I am protected.No one can get to me.By day one way, by night another. They call on me.My name is Catarina.Codename: Night Fury.No one is safe from me.I will come for you.
author: Belle Aurora
